1.title: Healthy Habits

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Pat and Gina cook-up healthy foods with their daughter, Spenser Neely. Included: white bean and roasted garlic dip; Portobello Panini; asparagus soup.

3.title: Money Saving Party Pleasers!

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: The Neelys plan a party on a budget. On the menu: cheesy pork enchiladas; sweet-and-spicy sticky wings; a side comprised of summer squash and green rice; and frozen peach margaritas.

4.title: Game Night Grub

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: On the menu: mini-turkey burgers; hot goat-cheese dip; smoked-cheddar-and-apple quesadillas; and buttered-herb popcorn.

5.title: Modern Southern Meal

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot:

7.title: Neely's Cajun Style

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: Preparing Cajun favorites, including shrimp etouffee; fried oysters with remoulade; and bourbon-brown-sugar ice cream sundaes with homemade maple whipped cream.

8.title: Cozy Comfort

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: Comfort foods are made, including roasted lamb chops with a Parmesan-panko breading; cauliflower-and-parsnip gratin; braised mixed greens; hummingbird cupcakes.

9.title: Memphis-Mex

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: On the menu: chicken stew with green chilies; spicy chipotle cornbread; Texas caviar; and molasses cookie sandwiches.

10.title: Big Brunchin'

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: Grilled steak and eggs, a hash-brown casserole, spiced-applesauce cake and Mexican hot chocolate are served for brunch.

11.title: Afternoon Delights

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot: Tilapia sandwiches, served with smoked-paprika potato salad, stuffed mushrooms and roasted broccoli with walnuts and garlic.

12.title: Simple Classics

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

12.plot: On the menu: butterflied grilled chicken with thyme and lemon; a simple green salad; zucchini ribbons with butter and herbs; baked tomatoes; blueberry frozen yogurt.

13.title: Slimmer Supper

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

13.plot: Grilled salmon with citrus butter, mustard potato cakes, a crunchy green-bean salad and raspberry-basil iced tea are served.

14.title: Money Saving Party Pleasers! #2

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

14.plot: The Neelys plan a party on a budget. On the menu: cheesy pork enchiladas; sweet-and-spicy sticky wings; a side comprised of summer squash and green rice; and frozen peach margaritas.

1.title: Sunday Supper

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Sunday night supper is a staple in the Neely family. From their Signature BBQ Ribs to Mama's Strawberry Shortcut Cake, Pat and Gina cook up some of their restaurant's secret recipes for their entire family.

2.title: Get Out of My Way (Foods that Gina Craves)

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: It's all about foods Gina loves and craves. Whether it's Fried Pork Chop and Vegetable Soup or Grilled Pound Cake Sundaes, when she wants them, you better get out of her way.

3.title: Courting Pat (the Foods that Help Gina Win Pat's Heart)

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: You know what they say; the way to a man's heart is through his stomach. So, Gina cooks up the recipes that helped her win her husband Pat's heart and will help you win your man, too - If Get Yo Man Chicken doesn't work, then the Brownie Crunch definitely will!

4.title: Expandable Pants (Pat's Three Brothers Drop by for Dinner)

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: When Pat's brothers stop by, you better have food that will satisfy their big appetites. Gina and Pat cook up some of the boys' childhood favorites, from Mama's Lasagna to Frozen Lemonade Pie, a menu that's sure to expand your pants.

5.title: We Really Do Have Friends (Pat and Gina Entertaining Friends)

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: Gina and Pat work hard and play hard. Even after a long day at the restaurant, they love to entertain and spend time with their friends. When they dream up a menu that features Roasted Cornish Hens, Creamed Collard Greens, Twice Baked Sweet Potatoes and Apple Crisp, you just know it's gonna be a party!

6.title: Fast Food

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: Why go through the drive-through when you can give fast food a twist at home Neely-style? Pat and Gina take some of their family favorite fast foods, like Spicy Chicken Wings and Potato Chips, and cook up a drive-through version right in their own kitchen. Their daughters join them for a meal that's fun, fast and easy for the whole family!

7.title: If Pat's a Good Boy: Pat's Favorites

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: From BBQ Turkey Meatloaf to Bacon Breadcrumb Mac and Cheese or Buttermilk Cupcakes with Chocolate Cream Cheese Frosting, when Pat's on his best behavior he gets a taste of all his favorite dishes.

8.title: Sunday Sleep In

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: The Neelys cook up Pat's Country Breakfast Trifle, Gina's famous Cinnamon Rolls, Pig Waffles with Strawberry Sauce and they top it off with Tropical Mimosas.

9.title: Pass It On

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: Pat and Gina pass down some of their family recipes to their daughters. You won't want to miss Nana's Seafood Gumbo, Grandma's Potato Salad and Mama Daisy's Homemade Banana Pudding. Even Uncle Tony stops by to share his Chicken Tenders and Honey Mustard Dipping Sauce!

10.title: Girls' Favorites: Cooking for the Girls

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: Gina and Pat cook up some of their daughters' favorite foods. With BBQ Shrimp, Sloppy Joes, Rotel Dip and Piggie Butter Cookies, Shelby and Spenser are sure to enjoy their favorite dishes.

11.title: Game Night

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot: Whether they're having friends over to watch the game or play cards, the Neelys have the perfect recipes to satisfy the whole group. It's their family staple: BBQ Nachos, Mini Memphis Blues Burgers, Collard Artichoke Dip and His and Hers Margaritas.

12.title: Vacation Bites

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

12.plot: Pat and Gina cook up some little bites inspired by their family trip to Spain. Enjoy Pulled Pork Bruschetta, Grilled Spanish Shrimp Phyllo cups, Sweet Potato Wontons and Sangria. It's a taste of Spain, Neely style.

13.title: It's Neely Lunch

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

13.plot: Who doesn't love a Pizza Party? Pat and Gina give this Friday night ritual their own twist with Grilled BBQ Pizza, Fried Portobello Mushrooms and their mother-in-law's Sock It To Me Cake.

1.title: Lovin' in the Oven

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Gina and Pat heat things up in the kitchen as they cook up a romantic dinner for two, Neely style, from their Flank Steak with Gorgonzola Sauce, Roasted Garlic Mashed Potatoes to a Spiced Chocolate Fondue with Fresh Strawberries.

2.title: Chef Tony

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Big Brother, Tony, puts on his chef cap and stops by to share a few of his favorite recipes with Pat and Gina. They're cooking up Smoked Beef Brisket, Grilled Stuffed Tomatoes, Black Eye Pea Salad and Tony's Pecan Pie.

3.title: Somethin' Outta Nothin'

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: The Neelys are turning everyday foods into something special. Pat and Gina cook up an Easy Lemon Pasta and Broccoli Soup. Their daughter, Shelbi, joins them in the kitchen for Grilled BBQ Potato Skins and an Everything But the Kitchen Sink Sundae!

4.title: Blissful BBQ

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Pat and Gina take grilling to the next level with recipes for Grilled Salmon Steaks, Lobster Salad Cocktail, Grilled Vegetable Salad, and Mini Brownie Bites w/Orange Cream Cheese Frosting.

8.title: Big Easy Eats

episode of.title: Down Home with the Neelys (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: New Orleans favorites, including smoked-sausage jambalaya; braised collard greens; fried jumbo shrimp with spicy remoulade sauce; and bananas-Foster ice cream with rum sauce.

imdb.plot outline: Pat and Gina Neely and their family own and operate some of Tennessee's best - and devilishly delicious - barbecue restaurants. But when they are relaxing at home in Memphis, they love to create tasty dishes their whole family can enjoy. Now they're ready to share secrets from their famous restaurant dishes along with their tastiest family-friendly recipes.
imdb.title: Down Home with the Neelys
akas: Down Home with the Neelys (United States)
plot: Learn about barbecue from the experts - Pat and Gina Neely, owners and founders of the acclaimed Neely's Bar-B-Que restaurants.::IMDb Editors

Pat and Gina Neely and their family own and operate some of Tennessee's best - and devilishly delicious - barbecue restaurants. But when they are relaxing at home in Memphis, they love to create tasty dishes their whole family can enjoy. Now they're ready to share secrets from their famous restaurant dishes along with their tastiest family-friendly recipes.::Official Site
